title: Customization UX
description: Live preview and form-based customization of landing page sections

requirements.title: Split customization layout
requirements.description: Each slide customization page shows form (one column) + live preview (other column), stacked on mobile
requirements.notes: Use responsive grid: side-by-side on desktop (md+), stacked on mobile

requirements.title: Live preview updates
requirements.description: Form field changes update preview within 300ms (debounced) without page reload
requirements.notes: Use React state + debounce (300ms) to update preview iframe or component
